txt.en: Gîmog the goblin has gathered a number of followers to the shrine he established in Gamilnafûk behind the Dolven-view dwarf-door. While not numerous by goblin-standards, there are still a fair number of them...enough to defeat the small group of dwarves that attempted to explore the space.

'The goblins in Gamilnafûk are deadly fanatics, [placeholder]. We cannot let them remain this near to the Dolven-view.

'Gather a companion or two and force them out of the tunnels or destroy them, before they become a real threat to us.

'The door to Gamilnafûk lies to the east of here.'
The door to Gamilnafûk lies to the east of the Dolven-view camp.\n\nWathi has asked you to drive forth Gîmog's fanatical followers within Gamilnafûk. He warned you to take a friend or two with you.
'Your efforts are admirable, [placeholder], but more goblins are gathering within Gamilnafûk. Gîmog's following grows still.\n\n'Nevertheless, you have earned a reward.'
Wathi is at the Dolven-view camp, west of Gamilnafûk.\n\nYou should tell Wathi that Gîmog's followers have all been scattered or destroyed.
'So the followers of Gîmog are no more? Excellent.\n\n'Once we have reclaimed Gamilnafûk, it should prove quite useful to us!'
Talk to Wathi at the Dolven-view camp
HIDING CONTENT - DNT - Gamilnafûk: the Followers of Gîmog
